video_prompt: A news anchor is reporting on a traffic accident that occurred in Dexas, where two people were injured but there were no fatalities. The scene is set in a modern news studio with a large screen displaying the accident scene. Paramedics and firefighters are actively working to assist the injured person, who is lying on the ground, partially covered by a blanket. The background is filled with the sounds of emergency vehicle sirens and the chatter of bystanders.

speech_prompt.speaker: the woman
speech_prompt.text: There is an accident happens in Dexas, 2 injured, no death.
